document.full_text: with engineers no closer to regaining control of six reactors hit by a giant tsunami one month ago, japan plans to extend the evacuation zone around the fukushima daiichi plant.
document.title: japan set to extend nuclear evacuation zone
lines_and_colors: with engineers no closer to regaining control of six reactors hit by a giant tsunami one month ago, japan plans to extend the evacuation zone around the fukushima daiichi plant.
